product.title: Magic Styler 4-in-1 Airstyler, Magicstyler Air Styler, Curling Iron Brush Air Curler Air Styler Wrap, Auto Wrap Curlers, Multi Hair Styler for Fast Hairstyle (Blue Gold)

Specifications: 
Name: Auto Curlers 
Weight: 900g 
Package Size: 30.5*29.5*6.5cm/12.01*11.61*2.56in 
Color: Gray Purple, White Gold, Blue Gold

2.If you are not satisfied, please contact me immediately through Amazon!

product.description_full:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION 


Specifications: 
Name: Auto Curlers 
Weight: 900g 
Package Size: 30.5*29.5*6.5cm/12.01*11.61*2.56in 
Color: Gray Purple, White Gold, Blue Gold 
Package Includes: 
1Pcs * Auto Curlers 
2Pcs * Bangs Clip 
Note: 
1.Due to manual measurement, lighting shooting reasons and the real thing will be slightly different, please understand. 
2.If you are not satisfied, please contact me immediately through Amazon! * 【Hair Styler Set】The versatile stylers attach to the styling wand & hair dryer and give you the power to explore styles for any hair type. The hair dryer brush set includes 1x hair dryer for fast drying, 2 x 15.7 inch left and right rotating curling iron for curling, 1x hair dryer brush for volumizing, 1x hair straightener for smoothing
 * 【Interchangeable Brush Head Design】Hot air brush can easily change brush heads with the press of a button.You'll have a mini hair salon at home, Combines drying, straightening, smoothing, curling, and volumizing in one tool, save time and money
 * 【For All Hair Kind】Powerful, fast-drying hair dryer and ultra-versatile multi-styler for straight, wavy, curly, and volumizing hair. Blow dryer brush is compact and lightweight, the professional 360° swivel cord is ergonomic
 * 【Safety Hair Dryer Brush】The hairbrush hair dryer can effectively dry hair without damaging it, and can flexibly set various hairstyles you want. Choose the best temperature for your hair
 * 【Multifunctional Blow Dryer Brush】Multifunctional blow dryer brush allow you easily become your own stylist and create various styles you want

Product Description


Specifications:
Name: Auto Curlers
Weight: 900g
Package Size: 30.5*29.5*6.5cm/12.01*11.61*2.56in
Color: Gray Purple, White Gold, Blue Gold
Package Includes:
1Pcs * Auto Curlers
2Pcs * Bangs Clip
Note:
1.Due to manual measurement, lighting shooting reasons and the real thing will be slightly different, please understand.
2.If you are not satisfied, please contact me immediately through Amazon!



  • 【Hair Styler Set】The versatile stylers attach to the styling wand & hair dryer and give you the power to explore styles for any hair type. The hair dryer brush set includes 1x hair dryer for fast drying, 2 x 15.7 inch left and right rotating curling iron for curling, 1x hair dryer brush for volumizing, 1x hair straightener for smoothing
  • 【Interchangeable Brush Head Design】Hot air brush can easily change brush heads with the press of a button.You'll have a mini hair salon at home, Combines drying, straightening, smoothing, curling, and volumizing in one tool, save time and money
  • 【For All Hair Kind】Powerful, fast-drying hair dryer and ultra-versatile multi-styler for straight, wavy, curly, and volumizing hair. Blow dryer brush is compact and lightweight, the professional 360° swivel cord is ergonomic
  • 【Safety Hair Dryer Brush】The hairbrush hair dryer can effectively dry hair without damaging it, and can flexibly set various hairstyles you want. Choose the best temperature for your hair
  • 【Multifunctional Blow Dryer Brush】Multifunctional blow dryer brush allow you easily become your own stylist and create various styles you want

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
